optFreeFire: sm defragment abort;sm idle-maint abort;am set-deterministic-uid-idle current false
performa: cmd power set-adaptive-power-saver-enabled false;cmd power set-fixed-performance-mode-enabled true;cmd power set-mode 0;cmd thermalservice override-status 0
performaRmv: cmd power set-adaptive-power-saver-enabled true;cmd power set-fixed-performance-mode-enabled false;cmd power set-mode 1;cmd thermalservice override-status 1
